verses.plain: Make haste, O God, to deliver me; make haste to help me, O LORD.

tokens.t: , O God, to deliver me; make haste to help me, O

verses.plain: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul: let them be turned backward, and put to confusion, that desire my hurt.

tokens.t: Let them be ashamed and confounded that seek after my soul: let them be turned backward, and put to confusion, that desire my hurt.

verses.plain: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say, Aha, aha.

tokens.t: Let them be turned back for a reward of their shame that say, Aha, aha.

verses.plain: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.

tokens.t: Let all those that seek thee rejoice and be glad in thee: and let such as love thy salvation say continually, Let God be magnified.

verses.plain: But I am poor and needy: make haste unto me, O God: thou art my help and my deliverer; O LORD, make no tarrying.

tokens.t: poor and needy: make haste unto me, O God: thou
my help and my deliverer; O
